attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Child Sexual Abuse occurs in the current day and affects thousands of innocent children.

Each year there is an annual rally from Hyde Park to Trafalgar Square in London to raise awareness of child sexual abuse.  A manual petition is available for individuals to sign and this is for those that are unable to attend the rally personally to lodge their support to stop child sexual abuse by signing this on-line petition.

We request the Prime Minister to:

• Impose appropriate custodial sentences upon ALL sex offenders.
• Empathic dealings in courts with Survivors of sexual abuse.
• Sustained funding for agencies already working with Survivors. 
• Raise awareness to STOP the sexual abuse of children NOW.
